products.product_description: A Tuna Bread Roll is a delectable handheld snack featuring a soft bread roll filled with a flavorful mixture of tuna, mayonnaise, and optional additions like crunchy vegetables or cheese.
A Tuna Salad Sandwich with Cheese is a comforting delight, featuring creamy tuna salad layered between two slices of bread, complemented by melted cheese, creating a savory and satisfying meal.
A tuna pie is a savory pastry filled with a creamy mixture of tuna, vegetables, and seasonings, baked until golden and delicious.
